entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:07 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7Â°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with freezing rain and snow this morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
